subject: biology
topic: Blood Types - Why O is Universal Donor
hook: Your blood can KILL someone... or SAVE their life. 4 letters decide!
key_points: 4 blood types: A, B, AB, O - based on ANTIGENS on RBCs
Type A has A antigens, Type B has B antigens
Type O has NO antigens - universal DONOR!
AB has NO antibodies - universal RECEIVER!
core_analogy: Antigens = ID badges on cells. Immune system checks IDs - wrong badge = ATTACK!
mind_blow: Less than 7% Indians have O-negative - rarer than JEE AIR-1!
exam_relevance: NEET 2024: Why blood transfusion mismatch causes agglutination?
